javadoc:
Interface to define methods for an editor that supplies its own
 component to be displayed in the OptionsDialog.

methods.javadoc:
A signal to reload the GUI widgets in the component created by this editor.  This will 
 happen when the options change out from under the editor, such as when the user restores
 the default options values.
methods.name: reload
methods.comment:
A signal to reload the GUI widgets in the component created by this editor.  This will 
 happen when the options change out from under the editor, such as when the user restores
 the default options values.

methods.name: setOptionsPropertyChangeListener
getEditorComponent

params.name: options
params.comment: The editable options that for which a GUI component will be created

params.name: editorStateFactory
params.comment: The factory that will provide state objects this options editor

name: OptionsEditor
comment:
Interface to define methods for an editor that supplies its own
 component to be displayed in the OptionsDialog.
